description:
The Ultimate HTML & CSS Course: Build 10 Websites

This course covers HTML & CSS in details. First we will learn the basics of HTML & CSS and then we will be coding a simple website and different parts of the website to really understand the website structure.

This course is divided into several sections.

  • HTML Basics
  • In this section we will learn all about HTML tags.
  • CSS Basics
  • In this section we will learn all about CSS.
  • Coding Random stuff
  • In this section we will be coding different sections of the website to really understand how website should be code.
  • Coding & styling website 1
  • In this section we will be code and styling our first website.
  • Coding & styling website 2
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our second website.
  • Coding & styling website 3
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our third website.
  • Coding & styling website 4
  • In this section we will be coding our styling our fourth website.
  • Coding & styling website 5
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our fifth website.
  • Coding & styling website 6
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our sixth website.
  • Coding & styling website 7
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our seventh website.
  • Coding & styling website 8
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our eighth website.
  • Coding & styling website 9
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our ninth website.
  • Coding & styling website 10
  • In this section we will be coding and styling our tenth website


At the end of this course :

  • you'll be able to code and style any kind of website you can see on the web. 
  • You can convert any design file into HTML & CSS.
  • You can convert PSD into HTML & CSS in no time.
  • You will be very comfortable writing HTML & CSS.
title: HTML & CSS Ultimate Course - Build 10 Websites
